thread.title: VIDEO: Star Wars trailer: What we know so far
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Star Wars trailer: What we know so far

title: VIDEO: Star Wars trailer: What we know so far
text:
Star Wars VII: The Force Awakens trailer gets fans into a frenzy 20   12:27 BST 
The full trailer for Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens has been released two months before the film hits cinemas. 
The two and a half-minute clip made its debut on US television and already has millions of views on YouTube. 
The Force Awakens, the seventh film in the franchise, is one of the most anticipated movies of the year. 
The trailer gives a closer look at the film's three lead characters played by Daisy Ridley (Rey), John Boyega (Finn) and Adam Driver as the villainous Kylo Ren. 
It also features some familiar faces from the original trilogy including Harrison Ford as Han Solo and Carrie Fisher as Leia. 
Entertainment correspondent Tim Masters takes a closer look at the trailer and the reaction on social media. 
The film is released in the UK on 17 December.
